content: विनिवृत् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To turn back, return. {@--2@} To cease, come to an end; सपिंडता तु पुरुषे सप्तमे विनिवर्तते <ls>Ms. 5. 60</ls>; <ls>Bg. 2. 59.</ls> {@--3@} To desist, turn away, abstain (from); देवनात्, युद्धात् &c. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to cease or step, withdraw; <ls>Ś. 7. 26.</ls> {@--2@} To restrain, withhold. {@--3@} To renounce.
